Title: Burning Bridges
Writer: Naomi Ekperigin (staff writer), Ilana Glazer (created by), Ilana Glazer, Abbi Jacobson (created by), Abbi Jacobson, Achilles Stamatelaky (staff writer)
Actors: Abbi Jacobson, Ilana Glazer, Paul W. Downs, John Gemberling
Plot: Ilana's parents come to the city for their 30th anniversary, but Abbi and Ilana find it hard to celebrate while they are both experiencing relationship issues.
